Feature.Description: Control a DASGIP pressure module. Enables read and write operations for various parameters, including pressure sensor and controller. By Lukas Bromig, Institute of Biochemical Engineering, Technical University of Munich, 20.05.2019

Command.Description: Get present value

Parameter.Description: The UnitID of the addressed reactor

Response.Description: Current present value

Command.Description: Set the manual pressure setpoint.

Parameter.Description: The UnitID of the addressed reactor
The manual setpoint of the pressure module.

Response.Description: The set manual setpoint.

Command.Description: Set the external pressure setpoint.

Parameter.Description: The UnitID of the addressed reactor
The external setpoint of the pressure module.

Response.Description: The set external setpoint.

Command.Description: Get setpoint value

Parameter.Description: The UnitID of the addressed reactor

Response.Description: Current setpoint value

Command.Description: Get automatic setpoint value

Parameter.Description: The UnitID of the addressed reactor

Response.Description: Current automatic setpoint value

Command.Description: Get manual setpoint value

Parameter.Description: The UnitID of the addressed reactor

Response.Description: Current manual setpoint value

Command.Description: Get external setpoint value

Parameter.Description: The UnitID of the addressed reactor

Response.Description: Current external setpoint value

Command.Description: Get remote setpoint value

Parameter.Description: The UnitID of the addressed reactor

Response.Description: Current remote setpoint value

Command.Description: Get access mode value. Controller access (Local, Remote).

Parameter.Description: The UnitID of the addressed reactor

Response.Description: Current access mode value. Controller access (Local, Remote)

Command.Description: Set the controller command. Controller command (Nothing, Stop, Start).

Parameter.Description: The UnitID of the addressed reactor
The controller command of the pressure module. Controller command (Nothing, Stop, Start).

Response.Description: The set controller command.

Command.Description: Get the controller command. Controller command (Nothing, Stop, Start).

Parameter.Description: The UnitID of the addressed reactor

Response.Description: Current controller command value of the pressure module. Controller command (Nothing, Stop, Start)

Command.Description: Set the controller mode. Controller mode (Manual, Automatic).

Parameter.Description: The UnitID of the addressed reactor
The controller mode of the pressure module. Controller mode (Manual, Automatic).

Response.Description: The set controller mode.

Command.Description: Get the controller mode. Controller mode (Manual, Automatic).

Parameter.Description: The UnitID of the addressed reactor

Response.Description: Current controller mode value of the pressure module. Controller mode (Manual, Automatic).

Command.Description: Set the selected setpoint that should be used. Setpoint selection (Local, Manual, Internal, Script, External).

Parameter.Description: The UnitID of the addressed reactor
The selected setpoint of the pressure module. Setpoint selection (Local, Manual, Internal, Script, External).

Response.Description: The set setpoint selection.

Command.Description: Get the setpoint selection. Controller state (Off, On, Error).

Parameter.Description: The UnitID of the addressed reactor

Response.Description: Current setpoint selection value of the pressure module. Controller state (Off, On, Error).

Command.Description: Get controller state. Controller state (Off, On, Error).

Parameter.Description: The UnitID of the addressed reactor

Response.Description: Current controller state value of the pressure module. Controller state (Off, On, Error).

Command.Description: Get function type.

Parameter.Description: The UnitID of the addressed reactor

Response.Description: Current function type value of the pressure module.

Command.Description: Get function availability.

Parameter.Description: The UnitID of the addressed reactor

Response.Description: Current function availability value of the pressure module.

Command.Description: Get function name.

Parameter.Description: The UnitID of the addressed reactor

Response.Description: Current function name of the pressure module.

Command.Description: Get function model version number.

Parameter.Description: The UnitID of the addressed reactor

Response.Description: Current function model version number of the pressure module.

Command.Description: Set the sensor offset value that should be used. Sensor offset calibration parameter.

Parameter.Description: The UnitID of the addressed reactor
The sensor offset value that should be used. Sensor offset calibration parameter.

Response.Description: The set sensor offset value that is used. Sensor offset calibration parameter.

Command.Description: Get the sensor offset value that is used. Sensor offset calibration parameter.

Parameter.Description: The UnitID of the addressed reactor

Response.Description: Current sensor offset value of the pressure module. Sensor offset calibration parameter.

Command.Description: Get the sensor present raw value. Actual process raw value.

Parameter.Description: The UnitID of the addressed reactor

Response.Description: Current sensor present raw value of the pressure module. Actual process raw value.

Command.Description: Set the sensor compensation value. Sensor temperature compensation parameter.

Parameter.Description: The UnitID of the addressed reactor
The sensor slope value. Sensor temperature compensation parameter.

Response.Description: The set sensor compensation value. Sensor temperature compensation parameter.

Command.Description: Get the sensor compensation value. Sensor temperature compensation parameter.

Parameter.Description: The UnitID of the addressed reactor

Response.Description: Current sensor compensation value of the pressure module. Sensor temperature compensation parameter.

Command.Description: Set the controller deadband value. PID controller: deadband (set to zero to disable).

Parameter.Description: The UnitID of the addressed reactor
The controller deadband value. PID controller: deadband (set to zero to disable).

Response.Description: The set controller deadband value. PID controller: deadband (set to zero to disable).

Command.Description: Get the controller deadband value. PID controller: deadband (set to zero to disable).

Parameter.Description: The UnitID of the addressed reactor

Response.Description: Current controller deadband value of the pressure module. PID controller: deadband (set to zero to disable).

Command.Description: Get the controller output value. PID controller: actual output value.

Parameter.Description: The UnitID of the addressed reactor

Response.Description: Current controller output value of the pressure module. PID controller: actual output value.

Command.Description: Set the controller proportional parameter value. PID controller: proportional parameter.

Parameter.Description: The UnitID of the addressed reactor
The controller proportional parameter value. PID controller: proportional parameter.

Response.Description: The set controller proportional parameter value. PID controller: proportional parameter.

Command.Description: Get the controller proportional parameter value. PID controller: proportional parameter.

Parameter.Description: The UnitID of the addressed reactor

Response.Description: Current controller proportional parameter value of the pressure module. PID controller: proportional parameter.

Command.Description: Set the controller differentiator time constant. PID controller: differentiator time constant (set to zero to disable).

Parameter.Description: The UnitID of the addressed reactor
The controller differentiator time constant. PID controller: differentiator time constant (set to zero to disable).

Response.Description: The set controller differentiator time constant. PID controller: differentiator time constant (set to zero to disable).

Command.Description: Get the controller differentiator time constant. PID controller: differentiator time constant (set to zero to disable).

Parameter.Description: The UnitID of the addressed reactor

Response.Description: Current controller differentiator time constant of the pressure module. PID controller: differentiator time constant (set to zero to disable).

Command.Description: Set the controller integrator time constant. PID controller: integrator time constant (set to zero to disable).

Parameter.Description: The UnitID of the addressed reactor
The controller integrator time constant. PID controller: integrator time constant (set to zero to disable).

Response.Description: The set controller integrator time constant. PID controller: integrator time constant (set to zero to disable).

Command.Description: Get the controller integrator time constant. PID controller: integrator time constant (set to zero to disable).

Parameter.Description: The UnitID of the addressed reactor

Response.Description: Current controller integrator time constant of the pressure module. PID controller: integrator time constant (set to zero to disable).

Command.Description: Set the controller minimal output value. PID controller: minimal output value.

Parameter.Description: The UnitID of the addressed reactor
The controller minimal output value. PID controller: minimal output value.

Response.Description: The set controller minimal output value. PID controller: minimal output value.

Command.Description: Get the controller minimal output value. PID controller: minimal output value.

Parameter.Description: The UnitID of the addressed reactor

Response.Description: Current controller minimal output value of the pressure module. PID controller: minimal output value.

Command.Description: Set the controller maximal output value. PID controller: maximal output value.

Parameter.Description: The UnitID of the addressed reactor
The controller maximal output value. PID controller: maximaloutput value.

Response.Description: The set controller maximal output value. PID controller: maximal output value.

Command.Description: Get the controller maximal output value. PID controller: maximal output value.

Parameter.Description: The UnitID of the addressed reactor

Response.Description: Current controller maximal output value of the pressure module. PID controller: maximal output value.

DefinedExecutionError.Description: Invalid range of the input parameter
